events.name: resilience measures
events.wd_description: To enhance the resilience of the cobalt supply chain, measures such as recycling technology, inventory management, and material substitution are implemented.
events.description: To enhance the resilience of the cobalt supply chain, measures such as recycling technology, inventory management, and material substitution are implemented.

events.name: recycling technology
events.wd_description: Improved recycling technology increases cobalt supply capacity and reduces supply pressure.
events.description: Improved recycling technology increases cobalt supply capacity and reduces supply pressure.

events.name: inventory management
events.wd_description: Effective inventory management helps the cobalt supply chain respond to demand shocks.
events.description: Effective inventory management helps the cobalt supply chain respond to demand shocks.

events.name: material substitution
events.wd_description: Substituting materials improves resilience but is less effective in mitigating supply disruptions from geopolitical risks.
events.description: Substituting materials improves resilience but is less effective in mitigating supply disruptions from geopolitical risks.

events.name: Production capacity
events.description: This encompasses the ability to maintain or increase cobalt production capacity through various resilience measures such as improved recycling technology.
